text: On 18 March 2025, Israel launched a large-scale missile and artillery attack in the Gaza Strip, the heaviest since a previous ceasefire agreement with Hamas. The Israeli Defense Forces (IDF), which has named the offensive Operation Might and Sword (Hebrew: מבצע עוז וחרב, Oz VaHerev). At least 404 were killed, and at least 660 were injured, including children. The offensive included airstrikes on multiple targets in Gaza City, Khan Yunis, and Rafah. Some high ranking people in Hamas were also killed. == References ==
title: March 2025 Israeli attacks on the Gaza Strip
